Title: A Measurement of Radius Inflation in the Pleiades 
       and its Relation to Rotation and Lithium Depletion 
Authors: Somers G., Stassun K.G. 
Table: Basic Pleiades Data
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: ajaa4ef4t1_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units   Label    Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  4 I4     ---     HII      The H II identifier
   6- 16 A11    ---     Tycho    Tycho-2 catalog identifier
  18- 33 A16    ---     2MASS    2MASS identifier 
  35- 43 F9.6   deg     RAdeg    Right Ascension in decimal degrees (J2000)
  45- 54 F10.6  deg     DEdeg    Declination in decimal degrees (J2000)
  56- 61 F6.3   mag     Vmag     V band magnitude (1)
  63- 66 F4.2   mag     B-V      The (B-V) color (1)
  68- 71 F4.2   mag   e_B-V      Uncertainty in B-V (1)
  73- 77 F5.3   mag     V-Ks     The (V-K_S_) color (2)
  79- 83 F5.3   mag   e_V-Ks     Uncertainty in V-Ks 
  85- 94 F10.8  d       PRot     ? Rotation period (3)
      96 A1     ---     Binary?  A binary system? Y|N
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note (1): Vmag and B - V data from 
          Johnson & Mitchell (1958) [1958ApJ...128...31J].
Note (2): Ks data from Cutri et al. (2003) [2003yCat.2246....0C].
Note (3): Rotation periods with two decimal places are from the K2 Pleiades 
          campaign (Rebull et al. 2016b [2016AJ....152..114R]; 
          Stauffer et al. 2016 [2016AJ....152..115S]), and those with 
          more decimals places are from the HATNet campaign 
          (Hartman et al. 2010) [2010MNRAS.408..475H].
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
